title-part.text: Methods or apparatus for filling containers with liquefied, solidified, or compressed gases under pressures

reference.text: adding propellants to aerosol containers B65B31/00

note.note-paragraph: This group includes not only the filling of vessels for storage of compressed or liquefied gases, but also the filling of pressurised apparatus insofar as it is not covered by a single other subclass, e.g. A62C, B05B.
